root.name: Umihara Kawase: Shun - Second Edition
root.description: OverviewUmihara Kawase Shun: Second Edition is an upgraded version of Umihara Kawase Shun developed by Jackpot and published by Xing for the PlayStation in Japan on January 20, 2000. The Second Edition was released as part of the Maruan series, which was a collaboration between several studios in Japan to create a series of indie games. The game features new levels, several bug fixes, and the removal of all Mitchell, a fishing supply company, commercials from the game. Umihara Kawase Shun: Second Edition also features more artwork by series character designer Toshinobu Kondo which is shown after the completion of certain levels and paths. A port of Umihara Kawase Shun: Second Edition was released for the PlayStation Portable in 2008 called Umihara Kawase Portable and was also included in a collection for the Nintendo DS in 2009 called Umihara Kawase Syun: Second Edition Kanzenban.
